Mod1_Description: {c_important}Fire Bolt{/c} generates {c_number}{SF_9}{/c} Mana when hitting a Burning enemy.
Mod4_Description: Critical Strikes with {c_important}Fire Bolt{/c} increase the Burning damage you deal to the enemy by {c_number}[{SF_11} * 100|%x|]{/c} for {c_number}{buffduration:UPGRADEB_CRIT_DAMAGE}{/c} seconds.
desc:
{if:ADVANCED_TOOLTIP}{c_label}Lucky Hit Chance: {/c}{c_resource}[{Combat_Effect_Chance_Script_Formula_Override:17}|%|]{/c}
{/if}Hurl a flaming bolt, dealing {c_number}{payload:DAMAGE}{/c} damage and Burning for {c_number}{dot:BURNING}{/c} damage over {c_number}{buffduration:BURNING}{/c} seconds.
name: Fire Bolt
